#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
int pies[30],racks[30];
int main()
{
    int T,N;
    scanf("%d",&T);
    while(T--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&N);
        for(int i = 0;i<N;i++)
            scanf("%d",&pies[i]);
        for(int i = 0;i<N;i++)
            scanf("%d",&racks[i]);
        std::sort(pies,pies+N);
        std::sort(racks,racks+N);
        int j = 0,coun = 0;
        for(int i=0;i<N;i++)
        {
            if(pies[j]<=racks[i])
                j++,coun++;
        }
        printf("%d\n",coun);
    }
    return 0;
}
